last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rafe, Miz, Shane, and Kane tie up loose ends. Bodies continue piling up in the streets.

name: Money & Violence
overview: Complex, urgent, and intensely engaging, Money and Violence is an immersive and revealing glimpse inside a brutal and little-understood subculture. Drugs, petty larceny, and casual violence.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Miz and China discuss their next mark. Jessica unpacks her new life in Brooklyn. Kane gets robbed on his way to see Rafe.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Rafe opens up to Miz about his financial situation. Kane can't find a job.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Kane gets pushed to his breaking point. The tables turn on Rafe. Miz collects on an old debt.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Yardies want revenge for their fallen friend. Miz brings Shane into the fold for the next job. Rafe makes a very tough decision.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The Yardies' tempers start to run high. Everybody hits Eastern Parkway for the Labor Day parade.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kane learns a valuable lesson on his first job with Rafe. Jessica bumps into Shay for the first time since moving to Brooklyn. The Yardies find their man through an unexpected source.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Fresh returns to Flatbush for a surprise visit. Miz gets word of impending war. Tai brings Shane to see a business associate. Rafe offers Kane an exit before moving on to the next job.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Rafe receives a helping hand on some cash. Shane and Tai bump heads. G and Fresh prepare for the fight ahead.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Rafe makes a new friend. Tai puts his plans in motion. Shane has a really bad day. Miz finds himself the center of conflict.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A job goes terribly wrong. Shane attempts to bounce back from his altercation. Kane bumps in to an old friend. Miz investigates a friend's murder.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: G and Fresh call in reinforcements. Miz and Maggz find a witness to their friend's murder. Joe leaves Shane high and dry in his moment of need.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Black hands a great tip to Rafe. Shane hustles to repay his debt to Miz. Maggz stumbles across the information he needs.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Maggz leads Miz to the Jamaicans. Shane finds out that everything that glitters isn't gold. Rafe nearly misses an opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Rafe remains sceptical of the new job. The tables are turned on Shane. G and Fresh try to make sense of their comrade's death.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: China finally charms Cash into divulging his secrets. Shane is left defenceless. G, Fresh and B.R. take drastic measures.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Tai advances to the next step of his plan. Miz's plug asks for a favour. Kane bumps into an old mark.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Kane tries to find a way to defend himself. Black sets up something big. G and Fresh take another stroll through the streets of Flatbush

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Shane closes in on the source of his bad luck. Kane continues to look for income. Miz gets ready for a fight.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Rafe confronts Miz about leaving him in the dark. The problem between Shane and Leon escalates. G, Fresh and B.R change their approach.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Miz learns the Jamaicans struck back. Shane starts questioning Tai's loyalty. Kane struggles to find his footing.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Miz informs Rafe of some bad news. Miz gives Shane a second chance.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: With the New Year fast approaching, everyone is preparing themselves for the changes on the streets of Brooklyn.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Shane confronts Tai about his treachery. The Yardies grow restless about B.R.'s behaviour. Rafe, Miz, and Kane act on a lead from Shane.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Kane earns his first big pay out. Capone hints to Miz that he may be ready for something bigger. The Yardies turn on B.R. The guys go after a big score.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Shane warns Shay that he's coming for Tai. Gunner and his wolves gear up for a showdown. Black and Rafe exchange words. A betrayal could prove fatal.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Rafe is out of commission. Shane helps Kane deal with the outcome of his showdown with Mister. Miz prepares to take the next step in a business relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Rafe gets back on his feet. Ronaldo looks for a snitch. Detectives come to the block. Shane learns his brother is getting out of jail.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Miz, Rafe, and China's scheme reaches its end game. Miz is put back to work by Capone. Kane contemplates how to deal with Mister. Shane meets with his brother.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Shane goes on the run. Rafe breaks his code to help Miz, which could lead to trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shane is stuck with Joe, who has made a questionable friend. Miz becomes a target.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Joe witnesses a horrific incident. Miz deals with the fallout of his bad luck. B.R. finds an unlikely ally as he schemes against his old friends.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Kane has a bad first day working for Shane. Rafe helps Miz recoup his losses. Joe keeps his distance from Ray.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Gunner and Leon are out for blood. Shane comes up with a business plan. Rafe plots against and old enemy.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Barz, Kane, and Shane struggle to work together. Black makes some moves. Victor sends a warning to Ronaldo.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Miz and Rafe both settle old scores. The guys attend a wake. The police finally catch up with Shane.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A business deal goes south. Kane and Shane investigate what happened to a friend.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Rafe, Miz, Shane, and Kane tie up loose ends. Bodies continue piling up in the streets.
